# GitHub Topics

Add these topics to your GitHub repository for better discoverability:

## How to Add Topics

1. Go to your repository on GitHub
2. Click the gear icon next to "About"
3. Add the following topics in the "Topics" field:

## Recommended Topics

```
defi
neobank
crypto-banking
web3
ethereum
aave
safe-wallet
base
react-native
nextjs
cloudflare-workers
open-source
typescript
monorepo
smart-wallet
yield-farming
stablecoin
crypto
```

## Why Topics Matter

GitHub topics help users discover your project when:

- Searching for related projects
- Browsing topic pages
- Finding similar repositories
- Exploring technology ecosystems

## Related Resources

- [GitHub Topics Documentation](https://docs.github.com/en/repositories/managing-your-repositorys-settings-and-features/customizing-your-repository/classifying-your-repository-with-topics)
